Bakery in Winchester, VA

Delicious, beautiful cupcakes and treats

Fresh from scratch.

Discover the best cupcakes, cakes, and baked treats in the Shenandoah Valley. For a birthday, dinner party, or just because you want them!
Find my flavor

About Us

All of our baked goods are made from scratch using farm fresh, organic ingredients.
We buy eggs from Boward Family Farm and our seasonal produce from Marker Miller Orchards and West Oaks Farm Market.

Pricing

Regular: $35/dozen ($50 mixed)
Filled: $45/dozen ($60 mixed)
† All orders by the dozen
†† Flavors marked * can be mixed
** Gluten / milk free available by request

Delivery

Delivery charges may apply.
Ask us for details.

Menu

All of our cupcakes are made with farm-fresh ingredients, and can be prepared gluten-free upon request.

Cravings

Rich, luscious, and just the fix you've been looking for.

Visions of Chocolate*

Chocolate cupcake with a white chocolate filling, your choice of chocolate or classic buttercream, topped with shaved chocolate

Peanut Butter Passion*

​Chocolate cupcake topped with peanut butter buttercream and a pretzel

Salted Caramel Bliss*

​Chocolate cupcake with caramel buttercream and sea salt topping

Chocolate Covered Strawberries*

Chocolate cake filled with chocolate mousse and strawberries topped with vanilla buttercream and a strawberry

Bountiful Produce

Delightful treats bursting with fresh—sometimes unexpected—flavors.

Apple Crisp*

Apple chunk cupcake with a cinnamon buttercream, topped with toasted oatmeal crumble

Peter Rabbit*

Carrot cupcake, classic buttercream frosting and candied carrot peels

South Pacific*

White cupcake with a white chocolate coconut filling topped with classic buttercream and fresh coconut flakes

Chocolate Mint*

A delectable basil buttercream frosting atop a chocolate cupcake leaving a mint chocolate taste in your mouth

Seasonal Favorites

Celebrate the four seasons with an assortment of wonderful, colorful cupcake flavors.

Irish Creme*

Chocolate cupcake with an Irish Cream Liqueur buttercream frosting

Strawberry Shortcake

Yellow cupcake with a strawberry filling, classic buttercream frosting topped with a strawberry​

Lovely Lemon

Lemon cupcake with a raspberry filling, lemon buttercream and yellow sprinkles or a fresh raspberry

Charlie Brown*

Pumpkin cupcake with classic buttercream frosting

Maple Spice

​Spice cupcake with maple syrup buttercream topped with nutmeg.

Candy Cane*

Chocolate cupcake topped with candy cane buttercream and a candy cane

Christmas Morning

Gingerbread cupcake with classic buttercream frosting and topped with a gingerbread cookie

Biscoff Biscotti*

Biscoff cake topped with cream cheese Biscoff buttercream and a Biscoff cookie

Kid Favorites

We know what kids want. And we have it!

Never Enough Sprinkles

White cupcake blended with sprinkles topped with classic buttercream icing smothered in cylinder sprinkles

Vanilla

Your choice of a yellow or white cupcake with either chocolate or classic buttercream frosting

Chocolate

Chocolate cupcake with your choice of chocolate or classic buttercream frosting

People Are Talking...

I highly recommend these cupcakes! They were delicious. The display table was lovely. Kathleen was pleasant, accommodating of the bride's wishes and highly organized.
- Beth
From the moment we met and sampled these cupcakes at a vendor fair, we were sold! Kathleen worked closely with us to design the perfect cake and desserts for our wedding. She was a pleasure to work with. She even took the time to research our engagement story and figured a way to incorporate that into our wedding display. Everything was perfect and our guests raved over her baking talent.
We continue to order on a regular basis and the cupcakes are amazing every single time! You have a customer for life! Thanks for such an easy, painless, enjoyable, and delicious experience!
- D & Sara
